eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 12:03 PM ON NOV 04, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:06 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police Department is looking for Joseph Joe Guaragna.  He is described as a white male, 57 years old, 6 feet tall, 160 pounds, bald, with grey facial hair, and blue eyes. Joe was last seen Monday, November 3, 2025, at 5:00 P.M. wearing a grey hoodie, red shorts over his grey sweatpants. Joseph Guaragna walked away from his home in the area of North 31st Avenue and West Butler Drive.   Joe suffers from a medical condition that may cause him to appear confused and lost easily. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
